Title: Exempts income earned by persons from certain job training or adult education programs from the determination of need for public assistance programs
Summary: Exempts income earned by a head of household or any person in the household from certain job training or adult education programs from the determination of  need for public assistance programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting income earned by persons from certain job training or adult education programs from the determination of need for public assistance programs
